svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 18, 2023" date: "2023-11-17"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Blob
sidecar inclusion proof: ~2 more weeks to implement Devnet-12 proposed for end of
November, no date yet for Goerli PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyiâ€™s EL client diversity proposal : run
one client & statelessly cross-validate with other clients
* Blob sidecar inclusion proof: ~2 more weeks to implement
Blob sidecar inclusion proof: ~2 more weeks to implement
* Devnet-12 proposed for end of November, no date yet for Goerli
Devnet-12 proposed for end of November, no date yet for Goerli
* PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyiâ€™s EL client diversity proposal : run one client & statelessly
cross-validate with other clients
PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyiâ€™s EL client diversity proposal : run one client & statelessly
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.41% is still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.41% is still far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 43% &
Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
* Geographic diversity needed , particularly outside of North America & Europe Ulisse
(geographical distribution of nodes): 3k locations & 11k nodes
Geographic diversity needed , particularly outside of North America & Europe
* Ulisse
Layer 1
* libMEV : MEV searcher data, beta
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Teku v23.11.0 : added validator duties timing metrics, increased
default number of threads for batch signature verification and added
checkpoint-sync-url CLI option
Consensus layer:
* Teku v23.11.0 : added validator duties timing metrics, increased default number of
threads for batch signature verification and added checkpoint-sync-url CLI option
* Execution layer: Besu v23.10.2 : upgrades vulnerable dependencies Erigon v2.54.0 Geth
v1.13.5 : fixes potential data corruption in path scheme during power failure
Execution layer:
* Besu v23.10.2 : upgrades vulnerable dependencies
Besu v23.10.2 : upgrades vulnerable dependencies
* Erigon v2.54.0
Erigon v2.54.0
* Geth v1.13.5 : fixes potential data corruption in path scheme during power failure
Geth v1.13.5 : fixes potential data corruption in path scheme during power failure
Layer 2
* Vitalik: return of Plasma , extending to the EVM using validity proofs EVM plasma
discussion
Vitalik: return of Plasma , extending to the EVM using validity proofs
* EVM plasma
* Lattice Redstone : Plasma-inspired data availability on top of OP Stack, live on
testnet
Lattice Redstone : Plasma-inspired data availability on top of OP Stack, live on
* L2BEAT Liveness dashboard : display of batch submission & state update intervals and
recent anomalies
L2BEAT Liveness dashboard : display of batch submission & state update intervals and
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs EIP7557 : Block-level warming (of addresses & slots with access lists)
EIPs
* EIP7557 : Block-level warming (of addresses & slots with access lists)
* RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals) Meta RIP7559 : RIP purpose and guidelines RIP7560
: Native account abstraction
RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals)
* Meta RIP7559 : RIP purpose and guidelines
Meta RIP7559 : RIP purpose and guidelines
RIP7560
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7558 : Batch (lock/unlock) minimal soulbound NFTs
(ERC721 extension) ERC7561 : Simple NFT (subset of ERC721) ERC7562 : Account
abstraction validation scope rules
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7558 : Batch (lock/unlock) minimal soulbound NFTs (ERC721 extension)
ERC7558 : Batch (lock/unlock) minimal soulbound NFTs (ERC721 extension)
* ERC7561 : Simple NFT (subset of ERC721)
ERC7561 : Simple NFT (subset of ERC721)
* ERC7562 : Account abstraction validation scope rules
ERC7562 : Account abstraction validation scope rules
Stuff for developers
* Foundry forge-std v1.7.2 : new cheat codes: loadAllocs (set state for accounts from
JSON), eth_getLogs & rpc (arbitrary RPC call)
Foundry
* forge-std v1.7.2 : new cheat codes: loadAllocs (set state for accounts from JSON),
eth_getLogs & rpc (arbitrary RPC call)
* ENS EVM Gateway : generic CCIP-Read gateway for reading & verifying data from L2
contracts
ENS EVM Gateway : generic CCIP-Read gateway for reading & verifying data from L2
* Trail of Bits roundme : recommends whether an arithmetic operation needs to round
up/down
Trail of Bits roundme : recommends whether an arithmetic operation needs to round
* EVM Hound : Rust library to extract potential function selectors from bytecode
EVM Hound : Rust library to extract potential function selectors from bytecode
* AI agent demo , send transactions on Base using OpenAI & Syndicate
AI agent demo , send transactions on Base using OpenAI & Syndicate
Security
* SEAL crisis handbook : incident response playbook for contract hacks
Ecosystem
* EFâ€™s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4, applications close January 15
EFâ€™s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4, applications close January 15
* Etherscan net transfers of a token for each address
Etherscan net transfers of a token for each address
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 14.4 to 239.1 gwei, with 33.9 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 21.8 gwei 9.1k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 14.4 to 239.1 gwei, with 33.9 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
* 9.1k ETH net burn this week
9.1k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $1,912 - $2,101, currently $1,961
ETHUSD : $1,912 - $2,101, currently $1,961
* ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* ZKP2P : USD onramp to Base using Venmo, alpha
ZKP2P : USD onramp to Base using Venmo, alpha
* Fireblocks balance verification Chrome extension, uses Lodestar light client,
experimental
Fireblocks balance verification Chrome extension, uses Lodestar light client,
* Gitcoin Grants matching updated, Passport score of 15 gives 50% match, 25+ gives full
match
Gitcoin Grants matching updated, Passport score of 15 gives 50% match, 25+ gives full
Job Listings
* Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
* Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
* Nethermind: Smart Contract Auditor , Lead Software Engineer & BizDev
Nethermind: Smart Contract Auditor , Lead Software Engineer & BizDev
* Gnosis seek DevRels , Senior Web Devs (Wallet) & Backend Devs
Gnosis seek DevRels , Senior Web Devs (Wallet) & Backend Devs
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities .
Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Coinbase-funded challenge to OFAC's Tornado Cash action taken to 5th Circuit
Coinbase-funded challenge to OFAC's Tornado Cash action taken to 5th Circuit
* International Organization of Securities Commissions recommendations for crypto
regulation
International Organization of Securities Commissions recommendations for crypto
* Singapore grants in-principle approval for StraitsX SGD & USD and Paxos USD
stablecoins
Singapore grants in-principle approval for StraitsX SGD & USD and Paxos USD stablecoins
* Mutant Ape Planet NFT creator pled guilty for conspiring to commit wire fraud in rug
pull
Mutant Ape Planet NFT creator pled guilty for conspiring to commit wire fraud in rug
General
* Randstorm: BitcoinJS vulnerability , vulnerable wallets found from 2011-2015
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-18-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Nov 29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19 ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
Nov 29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19 ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
* Nov 30 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
Nov 30 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
* Dec 4 â€“ ETHVenice
Dec 4 â€“ ETHVenice
* Dec 6-7 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
Dec 6-7 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
* Dec 7 â€“ Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF 3 voting ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
Dec 7 â€“ Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF 3 voting ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
* Dec 7 -10 â€“ ETHGlobal Pragma & ETHIndia (Bangalore)
Dec 7 -10 â€“ ETHGlobal Pragma & ETHIndia (Bangalore)
* Jan 15 â€“ EFâ€™s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
Jan 15 â€“ EFâ€™s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
